"}], "schemeDefinitions": [], "eligibilityCriteria": {"eligibilityDescription_md": "Outstanding Candidates pursuing Post Graduation or PhD in Economics/ Law/ Finance/ Management from Universities/ Institutions within the top 25 ranks as per the National Institutional Ranking Framework, by the Ministry of Human Resource Development or QS-ranked International Institutes. 
<br>

**NOTE 1:** The Department reserves all rights for offering an internship to any candidate. 
**NOTE 2:** An internship can be refused without assigning any reasons.
